com.beepell.activity.basic
Interface InboundMessageActivity

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageEventHandler, OnMessageHandler, Receive
public interface InboundMessageActivity

Common interface for inbound message activities: Receive, Pick, OnEvent.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl
